title: DigiCert to Revoke 83,000+ SSL Certificates Due to Domain Validation Oversight
description: Certificate authority (CA) DigiCert has warned that it will be revoking a subset of SSL/TLS certificates within 24 hours due to an oversight with how it verified if a digital certificate is issued to the rightful owner of a domain.
